Load in Data


Null Work

```{r}
#getting a list of indexes that have more than 3 nulls
to_drop = numeric(0)
for (i in 1:length(data$country)){
  if (sum(is.na(data[i,])) >=3){
    to_drop <- c(to_drop, i)
  }
}

data <- data[-to_drop, ]
data
```
